 The pod sewnt out another message. "Drill Bit. Its
me......do you know who this is. I am programed all i
need is a beast mode. If you attmept to reprogram me i
will shut down and i will die. Its destructor... I
have news of ............."the pod started to lose
power. It reearthed and awaited drill bits arrivel. It
was five feet from the base so it should take that
long.
